Works great! Thanks for the upload! For all those that cant figure out how to install- Go to Computer-Local Disk C (or which ever holds program files)-Program Files-AVS4YOU and place crack in AVSVideoConverter folder, make sure to relpace the existing file.  Hope that helps...... 
C:\Program Files\AVS4YOU
Thank you so much... it works perfect
